description: Western Province - Appt. of Hon. A.J.T.Perera as the Act. Chief Minister of the W/P w.e.f. 31.07.2011 & Actg. Minister of Finance & Planning, Law & Order, Land, Education, Local Govt. & Provincial Administration, Man Power & Employment, Economic Development & Power & Energy & Trade of the W/P. Appt. Mr. A.
